org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx
Class ActivityManagementMBeanImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.mx.util.JBossNotificationBroadcasterSupport
      org.jboss.system.ServiceMBeanSupport
          org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx.MobicentsServiceMBeanSupport
              org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx.ActivityManagementMBeanImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.management.MBeanRegistration, javax.management.NotificationBroadcaster, javax.management.NotificationEmitter, org.jboss.kernel.spi.dependency.KernelControllerContextAware, org.jboss.system.Service, org.jboss.system.ServiceMBean, ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
public class ActivityManagementMBeanImpl
extends MobicentsServiceMBeanSupport
implements ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean

This class provides minimum information for management console. It also tries to clean container of dead activities

Author:
Bartosz Baranowski, Eduardo Martins

public void setTimeBetweenLivenessQueries(long set)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Sets the period between activity context liveness queries. Its lower value should have boundry, after passing which MBean sets some default value.

setActivityContextMaxIdleTime

public void setActivityContextMaxIdleTime(long set)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Set max time an activity context can be idle. Its value indicates how long null ac can be idle before it will be removed. seting "0" turns of automatic null ac ending.

Specified by:
setActivityContextMaxIdleTime in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Parameters:
set - max time an activity context can be idle.

queryActivityContextLiveness

public void queryActivityContextLiveness()
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Query activity liveness on all resource adaptors. Calls javax.slee.resource.ResoourceAdaptor.queryLiveliness(javax.slee.resource.ActivityHandle)) for each RA activity present in container.

Specified by:

listActivityContexts

public java.lang.Object[] listActivityContexts(boolean inDetails)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
List all activity context with details.

Specified by:
listActivityContexts in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Returns:
report = Object[[#retrieveActivityContextDetails()],[#retrieveActivityContextDetails()][....]]. If boolean flag is set to false values with indexes:
  • ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean.SBB_ATTACHMENTS
  • ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean.NAMES_BOUND_TO
  • ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean.TIMERS_ATTACHED
  • ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean.DATA_PROPERTIES
will contain String represenation of integer number (which tells how many of certain property there is - see description of indexes) General description of return Object[] can be found here: http://groups.google.com/group/mobicents-public/web/mobicents-activity-context-mbean

retrieveActivityContextDetails

public java.lang.Object[] retrieveActivityContextDetails(ActivityContextHandle ach)
                                                  throws javax.slee.management.ManagementException
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Retrieves details of the Activity Context with the specified ID. Lists Sbbs attached, bound names etc - same as list listActivitContexts(true) but for one, and returns it in array, which is more conveniant to parse that String with tree.

Specified by:
retrieveActivityContextDetails in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Returns:
Object[] - its structure has been defined here http://groups.google.com/group/mobicents-public/web/mobicents-activity-context-mbean?version=8, also You can read static fields descritpiotn in MBean interface for this MbeanImpl
Throws:
javax.slee.management.ManagementException - if ac is not found

retrieveActivityContextIDByActivityType

public java.lang.Object[] retrieveActivityContextIDByActivityType(java.lang.String fullQualifiedActivityClassName)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Retieves list of Activity Context Handles related with specified Activity object class name

Specified by:
retrieveActivityContextIDByActivityType in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Parameters:
fullQualifiedActivityClassName - - like javax.sip.ServerTransaction
Returns:
  • Object[] constaining Strings in each field representing IDs of ACs
  • null - if no acs have been found for passed activity class name

retrieveActivityContextIDByResourceAdaptorEntityName

public java.lang.Object[] retrieveActivityContextIDByResourceAdaptorEntityName(java.lang.String entityName)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Retrieves list of Activity Context IDs related with specified Resource Adaptor entity name.

Specified by:
retrieveActivityContextIDByResourceAdaptorEntityName in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Parameters:
entityName - the entity name of the Resource Adaptor
Returns:
  • Object[] constaining Strings in each field representing IDs of ACs which have been created by ra entity with given name
  • null - if no acs have been found for passed ra entity name

retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbEntityID

public java.lang.Object[] retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbEntityID(java.lang.String sbbEID)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean

Specified by:
retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbEntityID in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Parameters:
sbbEID - - sbb entity ID for which Activity contexts IDs will be returned
Returns:

retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbID

public java.lang.Object[] retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbID(java.lang.String sbbID)
Description copied from interface: ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Retrieves list of Activity Context IDs related with specified SBB ID

Specified by:
retrieveActivityContextIDBySbbID in interface ActivityManagementMBeanImplMBean
Parameters:
sbbID - - SbbID, it should look like "SbbName#SbbVendor#SbbVersion"
Returns:
  • Object[] constaining Strings in each field representing IDs of ACs which have attached sbbs with given SbbID
  • null - if no acs have been found for passed SbbID
